i18n.why-bot-content:
It's simple. One night, I decided that I would make a bot. And not any bot, I would make the most kick ass bot Discord has ever seen.

I myself have made all of the code, but a couple of friends have helped me along the way. I would like to thank in particular:

utility.name: avatar
utility.desc: Fetches the avatar of an user
utility.description: Fetches the avatar of the user mentioned, or the user who executed the command.

utility.name: hello
utility.description: Greets the user who executed the command or the user mentioned.

utility.name: ping
utility.desc: Posts ping between the bot and discord
utility.description: Calculates latency between Discord servers and the bot client.

utility.name: prefix
utility.description:
Adds or removes the selected prefix.

Lists guild prefixes by default.

utility.name: runtime
utility.description: Shows how long the bot client has been running.

utility.name: test
utility.desc: Exactly what you think it does

utility.name: dice
utility.description: Simulates a dice throw. First argument decides how many sides the dice has, the second how many dice to throw.

utility.name: choose
utility.desc: Chooses one of the supplied elements
utility.description: Picks one of the supplied elements, delimited by the characters ";" and "|".

utility.name: coin
utility.description: Chooses one of either heads or tails pseudo-randomly.

utility.name: youtube
utility.description:
Searches YouTube for videos with the specified query string.

Can be prefixed with --dl to automatically convert it to mp3

utility.name: mp3
utility.description:
Converts a youtube video to the mp3 format.

Optionally, it takes start and end arguments to define where the file should begin and end playing.

You can set the file name by setting the title argument. It will always have the .mp3 extension.

utility.name: seen
utility.desc: Says last time someone was online
utility.description: Replies with the last time the supplied was seen by the bot.

utility.name: imagesearch
utility.desc: Provides a link to google image search
utility.description: Gives a link to a direct image search query with the mentioned user's avatar, or the url provided.
